price: 47. Kaadu Yalla kinni bar suturi siinih abtem kay ditet sari sin kah yastureh innah, kaadu Yalli xin sin xagarah raacat abeeh (ruñó) laqó rizqhi (quusi) guranah edde fixixxoonuh siinih abe.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا وَٱلنَّوۡمَ سُبَاتٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
